name: Spicy Japanese Crab Noodle Salad
author: Runira
summary: This is a cold noodle salad with crab, bean sprouts, red bell pepper, and cucumber in a spicy chile dressing. If you want to make it more substantial, you can add some squid rings.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon soy sauce, or more to taste
1 teaspoon Chinese chili bean sauce (doubanjiang), or more to taste
4 ounces instant ramen noodles (without flavor packet)
4 ounces cooked octopus, cut into bite-sized pieces  (Optional)
½  red bell pepper, sliced into rings
2 ounces cooked crab meat, broken up
1 tablespoon toasted nori (seaweed), crumbled, or more to taste
directions: Mix red wine vinegar, soy sauce, sugar, mirin, sesame oil, chili bean sauce, and balsamic vinegar in a small bowl to make dressing
Bring a small pot of water to a boil
Cook instant noodles until tender, about 3 minutes
Drain and transfer to a large bowl
Mix octopus, cucumber, red bell pepper, crab meat, bean sprouts, and scallions with noodles
Add dressing and mix to combine
Divide among serving plates and top with crumbled nori
